title: NORMALIZING NEW HEALTH TECHNOLOGIES: BUILDING A WEB ENABLED TOOLKIT FOR IMPLEMENTATION PRACTITIONERS
abstractText:
Normalisation Process Theory (NPT) identifies factors that promote and inhibit the routine incorporation of health technologies, organisational interventions and other complex interventions into everyday practice, and explains their operation.

The challenge that we face is translating a sociological theory into a form that can be taken up by health service managers and professionals, and used to support their work, and to plan implementation processes.

This project will build an on-line users' manual and web enabled toolkit for NPT, and connect these with the theory's users through an international network.
